snippet.title: An SCP Based Movement FPS Game...
snippet.description:
This is the trailer for SCP: Equestrian, a game that I am developing. It is a fast paced movement shooter that allows the player to combo many weapons and fight foes. There are also many secrets in the game that references some things. 

The gameplay is heavily inspired by ULTRAKILL and Doom Eternal. With the movement being partially inspired by Titanfall 2 and many source games. Map design is inspired by Black Mesa and many more classic titles. 
== Expand Me ==

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2560510/SCP_Equestrian/

SUBSCRIBE: https://bit.ly/2HusWQD​

Discord: https://discord.gg/a4b8ZXFPEZ

#scp #fps #game #beta #indie #indiegame #fastpacedgaming #movementshooter #speedgame
